languages.text: "Так точно! Выслушайте мой доклад и решайте с наказанием, но главное — выслушайте!" {n}В голосе молодой женщины звучит мольба.{/n}
"Yes, Lord Captain! Listen to my report and punish me as you wish, but all that matters is that you hear me out!" {n}says Vent, a pleading note entering her voice.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Так точно! Выслушайте мой доклад и решайте с наказанием, но главное — выслушайте!" {n}В голосе молодой женщины звучит мольба.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Yes, Lord Captain! Listen to my report and punish me as you wish, but all that matters is that you hear me out!" {n}says Vent, a pleading note entering her voice.{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

traits.locale_text: "Yes, Lord Captain! Listen to my report and punish me as you wish, but all that matters is that you hear me out!" {n}says Vent, a pleading note entering her voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Yes, Lord Captain! Listen to my report and punish me as you wish, but all that matters is that you hear me out!" {n}says Vent, a pleading note entering her voice.{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: “遵命，舰长大人！随便您怎么惩罚我都可以，但您一定要听我说完！”{n}温特中尉的声音中带着恳求的意味。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain! Listen to my report and punish me as you wish, but all that matters is that you hear me out!" {n}says Vent, a pleading note entering her voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “遵命，舰长大人！随便您怎么惩罚我都可以，但您一定要听我说完！”{n}温特中尉的声音中带着恳求的意味。{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: «¡De acuerdo, Lord Capitán! ¡Escuche mi informe y luego castígueme como estime oportuno! ¡Solo le pido que me escuche!». {n}Un tono de súplica entra en la voz de Vent.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain! Listen to my report and punish me as you wish, but all that matters is that you hear me out!" {n}says Vent, a pleading note entering her voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡De acuerdo, Lord Capitán! ¡Escuche mi informe y luego castígueme como estime oportuno! ¡Solo le pido que me escuche!». {n}Un tono de súplica entra en la voz de Vent.{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: 「はい、ロード・キャプテン！私の報告を聞いたうえで、好きなように罰してください。ですが、大事なのは私の話を最後まで聞いてくださることです！」{n}ヴェントは、懇願するような声音で叫んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain! Listen to my report and punish me as you wish, but all that matters is that you hear me out!" {n}says Vent, a pleading note entering her voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「はい、ロード・キャプテン！私の報告を聞いたうえで、好きなように罰してください。ですが、大事なのは私の話を最後まで聞いてくださることです！」{n}ヴェントは、懇願するような声音で叫んだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: "Jawohl, Lord Captain! Hört Euch meinen Bericht an und bestraft mich, wie Ihr möchtet. Wichtig ist nur, dass Ihr mich anhört!"{n}, sagt Vent, in deren Stimme nun ein flehentlicher Ton liegt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain! Listen to my report and punish me as you wish, but all that matters is that you hear me out!" {n}says Vent, a pleading note entering her voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Jawohl, Lord Captain! Hört Euch meinen Bericht an und bestraft mich, wie Ihr möchtet. Wichtig ist nur, dass Ihr mich anhört!"{n}, sagt Vent, in deren Stimme nun ein flehentlicher Ton liegt.{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: « À vos ordres, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Je me soumettrai volontiers aux sanctions que vous jugerez bon de m'imposer pour peu que vous soyez {mf|prêt|prête} à écouter ce que j'ai à dire ! » {n}répond Vent, une pointe de supplication dans la voix.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain! Listen to my report and punish me as you wish, but all that matters is that you hear me out!" {n}says Vent, a pleading note entering her voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « À vos ordres, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Je me soumettrai volontiers aux sanctions que vous jugerez bon de m'imposer pour peu que vous soyez {mf|prêt|prête} à écouter ce que j'ai à dire ! » {n}répond Vent, une pointe de supplication dans la voix.{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: "Başüstüne Lord Kaptan! Cezama razıyım ama lütfen beni dinleyin, bu çok mühim!" {n}Vent'in sesi, bir yakarışı andırmaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain! Listen to my report and punish me as you wish, but all that matters is that you hear me out!" {n}says Vent, a pleading note entering her voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Başüstüne Lord Kaptan! Cezama razıyım ama beni lütfen dinleyin, tek önemli olan bu!" {n}Vent'in sesi, bir yakarışı andırmaya başlıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader
